title: Sandan
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Khmer, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A training restaurant for former street kids. Offers Khmer food with around 6 vegetarian options that are vegan suitable. Menu states that vegetarian oyster sauce is used and the vegetarian items are guaranteed vegetarian. Offers local organic vegetables like lotus seed and broccoli. Many juices. Kitchen closes at 9-9:30pm. Lively atmosphere with children's play area, handicraft store on site to support disadvantaged locals. Sister restaurants in Phnom Pehn and Siem Reap.
